text.div:
personStateSearchParameter

Parameter address-state:string

Searches based on the person's recorded state/province of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-state={state}

ResourcePerson
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPerson
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: personStateSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the person's recorded state/province of address eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?address-state={state}
